name: Robert Lagman
text: Went on a Friday night with large group.   They were great and accommodated us quickly.  Server kept up with all of us and was excellent.   We ordered a couple pizzas,  calzones,  kids mac and cheese. Everything tasted fantastic.   Also got …More

name: Brian MacDonald
text: Great happy hour, half price drinks and appetizers.  Delicious meatballs, brushetta, and pretzel bites.

name: LaKetha Bailey
text: Delicious!! I have eaten @other Mellow Mushrooms but this one food was great and service was awesome.

name: Amanda Ansel Fraisse
text: I hate to post this, but it’s happened  too many times. While our food tasted great, it takes way too long to come out. We went on Mother’s Day and it was not busy at all (which usually means food service will be slow). Ordered two salads, …More

name: Andrew Wagner
text: Great food & cool atomophere it's higher prices then moat,pizza places but totally worth it

name: Alexandré Roddy
text: Absolutely love the atmosphere, very outgoing and original. Went there with friends and family, great place for all ages. Personally I prefer not to sit at the tables with TV's but kids love it. Keeps them very entertained. Food is delicious! Hope you like cheese, cheesiest pizza I've ever seen. So delicious!!

name: Ryan Harrington
text: My hoagie was delicious! The pretzels were extremely salted... I liked them, but my wife and daughter weren't so enthusiastic. My kid didn't care for her french bread pizza and my wife said the salad was "just okay." The service was …More

name: Melissa Kolb
text: Thank you for your delicious vegan options! My only gripe is that the music is always a bit loud and it makes it difficult to communicate with your party. Food, atmosphere and service is great!

name: Vee
text: Amazing food and happy hour starts at 3 ends at 6:30, half off all apps but the wings and half off drinks. There pizza to die for always fresh and mouth-watering, i normally get the bruschetta because of that balsamic glaze.

name: Travis Combel
text: Excellent pizza with so so service - par for the course over here. Tasty beer but not as expansive of a selection as the Denver location.

name: James Bigner
text: Awesome place! Food was great. The atmosphere was welcoming and "mellow".

name: James Cullifer
text: Was a good experience. Great service, great food, and the environment was nice. We had been wanting to go for quite awhile and it just never panned out for whatever reason. Glad we finally stopped in! …More

name: Melissa Creel
text: The mighty meaty pizza and the great white pizza are delicious. The great white has white sauce for those that can't have the red sauce.

name: Toby Lee Bonds
text: Loved the atmosphere a d food. Definitely going back!

name: Suzanne Elaine
text: Had a wonderful  dinner!! Waiter was new, but very polite and checked on us often. Will definitely  be back

name: Terri Gregory
text: If you are vegetarian, vegan, gluten intolerant or all of the above, this is the place for you! Flavor is not sacrificed. Also, for the rest of the family, it's delicious. The best mushroom soup EVER! I'm so grateful for a fun atmosphere and delicious food for all of my family's dietary needs. Also gluten free beer!!!!

name: Brittany Niemi
text: Great pizza, neat environment. If you like to sit at the bar, they make you feel comfortable. The only thing is they close very early for the type of atmosphere they promote. It would be nice if they stayed open later so I can enjoy the bar experience just a little more!

name: Daniel Tyrney
text: I love their pizza and the atmosphere and I got in and out for lunch with plenty of time to get back to work from lunch

name: Jessica Koster
text:
Food was good.
They also have a gluten free pizza which the girls demolished. It was a touch loud, but we were sitting by the band.

name: David Hartzell
text: Place is amazing. Owner not only offered to give me a taste of the different beers on tap, but gave my youngest daughter a free t-shirt out of kindness for no reason. Great family atmosphere. Customer for life! Service was fantastic!

name: janie fuller
text: Beth (@the bar-) was AWESOME! And the pizza ROCKED! Craig&Matt were great!

name: Symple_ Man
text: Great food always. Service was good. Pizza takes a while to come out but always well worth the wait. Best Chain pizza  store there is. AC was broken when I last visited but manager apologized when I asked staff if they could turn the AC …More

name: Tmaggot
text: Ordered the club sandwich. The table ordered a pizza. The sandwich that required no cooking came out five minutes after the pizza. With exception of the Turkey and cheese, half the sandwich had half the ingredients. The other half of the sandwich contained the other half of the ingredients. Will not return.

name: Stephen Silas Covell
text: Best happy hour in town, hands down. Plus people here are great.

name: Terry Martin
text: Great pizza!  Cold inside though so pack a sweat top (and I'm a guy that never complains about being cold)  Shitaki mushroom pizza and Blue Bayou pizza are my favorite.

name: Terry Durnin
text: Crust was very soggy and unappetizing. Bacon was very undercooked. Not worth 25$ for a large pizza. Our server ( Amber? ) was extremely nice.

name: Megan Simmons
text: I've never had a bad experience here, the food is awesome, the service is great, and I love the environment 💕

name: vicky williams
text: This is my family’s favorite pizza! Great atmosphere and we usually don’t wait too long. We do eat early though

name: Laurinda Frulla
text: My first time to ever hear about this place. The pizza was awesome. So glad we were with with a group so we were able to sample a variety

name: Jose Solorzano
text: I found the pizza to be just OK, nothing special at all and not worth the price. I had better BBQ pizza with chicken at Pizza Hut.

name: Dana Snell
text: Always a great crowd here! Friendly service and great pizza! The salads are awesome as well! Pick up or dine in!

name: Keith Ragan
text: Yes, it's more expensive than dominoes.  The crust is not a typical pale white flour though. It's a little more brown in color without tasting like wheat(no idea how this happens) but also has a nice flavor you wouldn't get with a New York …More

name: Jeff Linville
text: Great lunch with the family. Service was top notch and pizza was delicious.

name: Henry Perkins
text: Awesome place. Great food. The calzones are huge. The salad was delicious. Wait staff is awesome.

name: Michael Wheeler
text: All their locations have great atmospheres and this one is no different. Been great quality everytime. Nice servers. Good beer selections. It's a must if you haven't been and like pizza and good tunes to dine too.

name: Tom Z
text: Excellent restaurant. Staff here is very friendly and appropriately attentive. Mellow Mushroom has great food and drink options. There is a bar in the middle surrounded by the restaurant area. The bar doesn't interfere with the restaurant area so don't worry about bringing kids.

name: andrew vigueira
text: We had a great lunch:Melloterainian pizza and chicken salad sandwich. Great food and service.

name: Kepha Arcemont
text: Some of the best pizza I’ve had in years! Even good when it’s cold!

name: MARILYN ORTALANO
text: Mandeville Restaurant with great casual service. A must is the "Pizzas" with any of the exceptionally large salads sufficient for sharing.

name: Terri Sanders
text: I was amazed by the balsamic glaze that came with the bruschetta. It was delicious. I sat at the bar and the service was on point!

name: Deborah Mobberly
text: I had never been. Went with family and grandchildren. Nice relaxed surroundings, great service. It is not the same old stuff. Great impression on all of us.

name: brad slade
text: Wife is gluten free. Staff was very accommodating and super nice. Plenty of food at a fair price. Would recommend to everyone.

name: Jennifer
text: It would be nice to eat here but no one will come to the table. The restaurant is empty and now I see why. …More

name: Brendon Voelker
text: I've been to a lot of Mellow Mushrooms now and this location was very disappointing. I went twice, the first of which I virtually had the place to myself and received great service and a friendly talkative bartender. After that, I decided …More

name: James Bell
text: Pizza is outstanding, beer selection is mostly local craft beers.

name: Maria Oneal
text: Food was great. Service was great. However, it was cold in there, as usual, even when I was wearing a warm long sleeved shirt.  My husband was really cold, as were other patrons.

name: Craig Petit
text: Food & service was good, however my 11 year old and I were seated near the bar...A patron at the bar kept dropping "F" bombs during a conversation with Bar tender and nothing was said...

name: Chevy cajunguy
text: Very good restuarant. Pizza was the best! Great staff and proud to have it in my neck of the woods!! You guys rock!!

name: Brian Wright
text: Get the Bayou Bleu pizza, if you like Cajun flavors

name: Andrew Flick
text: We had a great time. Large portions so we each took food home. The spinach and artichoke dip was great. Our waitress was sweet.

name: Ethel Lucido
text: Delicious food and great music on the last Thursday of the month by Paul Lucido & Sax.

name: Levee Mann
text: Friendly staff good food stress free environment. A little jewel in the middle of a hectic place.

name: Darius Shad
text: I have to admit that every time I come back the crushed of the pizza is unlike any other pizza that I've had anywhere. It's very crunchy and tasty.  The choices of pizza and calzone are off the chart. Very good appetizers ranging from wings …More

name: Jenna R.
text: I'm disappointed. As a gluten free vegan I had high expectations for the pizza. I ordered the gluten free veggie with vegan cheese pizza and I could barely taste (or see) the tomato sauce, which was a shame because what I was able to taste …More

name: Casey B.
text: Poor service and mediocre food. Probably will not return.

name: Nature Jockk
text: So nice to go with our family to dine

name: Keith Ragan
text: There are cheaper pizza places, and more traditional pizza places, even close by. This place does not seem apologetic about not being that. I sit at the bar places like this, and get excellent service. MM is no exception. The crust here …More

name: Jason
text: Well priced lunch specials and good food.

name: C Lilly
text: Love that we have a mellow mushroom. Great selection of pizza and other menu items.  Friendly and helpful staff.

name: Carroll Jones
text: Great place the food is made when you order it.  The drinks are solid not watered down, the staff is friendly and it's a laid back atmosphere.  It's nice on the deck in good weather.  Reasonably priced too.

name: Ems mom
text: Salads, meatball app, and pizzas were all delicious!

name: kelly
text: Good pizza. We took the bus down to see the saints game and they were very organized

name: Daniel Willems Jr
text: Best food, prepared from scratch. Just order a drink (or two) while waiting for the food. But, omg, the food is so incredibly good and you'll have to take half of it home for dinner or the next day because the servings are HUGE. Did I mention the mellow atmosphere? Slow and low baby. All day all night alright!

name: Patricia Gonzalez
text: Food very salty. Personel was nice, courteous.

name: Kellen Ryno
text: Good food, friendly people

name: Victoria Pounds
text: Love this place.  Great food and service

name: Jessie
text: The pizza is great most of the time. I have been served burned pizza here on numerous occasions, however, and the speed of service is almost always lacking. The soft pretzels are great.

name: Paul Fitzgerald
text: Car show on the 2nd Friday of the month. Beautiful cars...wow. Great food and service.

name: Stacy Lynn
text: Yummy! Have got to have pizza everytime I am on the North Shore

name: Robin Leisure
text: My family ordered 3 lg pizza's for take out and the pizza's were not the quality that we are used to. I was so disappointed since I bragged about MM to my uncle from Brooklyn, NY. I gave 3 stars in my review for 2 reasons I LOVE Mellow …More

name: Sam McAlister
text: I have yet to have anything less than a 5 star experience at this Mellow Mushroom location. Their weekly happy hour special is great! 1/2 price off on any beverage behind the bar (including bottles of wine) and 1/2 priced appetizers until …More

name: marlon johnson
text: Spinach dip is to die for. The pizza is awsome as well.

name: Patrick Heraty
text: Good pizza, good service.

name: Nicolas Miller
text: Absolutely love this place, great atmosphere and food.

text:
Josh took good care of us...
Giving recommendations..

text: Had a great time on trivia night 😊

name: Bill
text: I had never been to a Mellow Mushroom before this visit, but my friends told me that the pizza was good and talked me into going. We walked in and there was no one at the front counter to seat us, so to my reluctance, we waited almost 15 …More

name: robby economides
text: Not bad but pizza sause tasted old

name: James Morgan
text: Brittany was tending the bar when I arrived. Other staff members doing sidework greeted me upon entry. Brittany, engaged with another customer, acknowledged me and let me find a seat. She attended to my cocktail post haste. The visit went uphill from there.

name: TIMOTHY ANDERSON
text: Pizza was great. Service great.

name: Konnie Knight
text: Our waitress was awesome but the pizza was NO WHERE like the Mellow Mushroom that we've been to before. Wasnt satisfied at all. Large pizza was $17.99 then additional $3.00 for each additional topping.

name: Carol-Jane Hasselbeck
text: The food is always good. But the wait staff is never good. The last time I went it took 10 mins before I was even greeted and I saw my server only when she took my order, brought out my food, and gave me my check

name: Gage Garofalo
text: It was okay. If someone asked where I wanted to eat this wouldn't be my first choice.

name: Kristin Faison
text: Service is always great, food is always on point. Fantastic family place.

name: Terri Breaux
text: Food,atomsohere, server was excellent will be back

name: Sue Tranchina
text:
Best pizza ever!..  Love the crust.
Will definitely be eating more pizza here.

name: Judy Murphy
text: Great pizza to go... got half mushroom and half shrimp...not sure what it was called... but it was delish. Bartender, Jordon, recommended it ..so very helpful!

name: Melissia ONeil
text:
Quick to be seated.
GREAT food.
Unbelievable service (Marissa).
Will be back in very near future.

name: Walley Borries
text: Super Happy Hour prices for drinks a d apps. Great pizzas...try the Shiitake Mushroom! You will love it.

name: Cori Adames
text: Went for lunch today and they weren't busy. Waited 40 minutes for our food and when I asked the waitress she told me another 10 minutes.  I was on my lunch break from work. Ended up leaving without eating.

name: Bianca Cruzen
text: The gluten free pizza here was amazing. I will definitely be back.

name: Beren Brechtel
text: GREAT PLACE TO EAT!. Your not going to spend a lot of money but will get a lot of food!

text: Excellent food.  Interesting decor.  Nice place.

name: Mike
text: Hands down best pizza around

name: Caroline Wadge
text: Pizza was just as good as always, but the main reason we went there on a Tuesday night was for the trivia, which was extremely lacking. It wasn't interesting, energetic, or competitive. The MC lost track of what he was doing multiple times, and the trivia questions were so obscure that the game quickly became no fun at all.

name: Richard Kerr
text: Good food and atmosphere.

name: Mike Chicago
text:
My first time in Covington, and first Mellow Mushroom experience.  We had 6 in our party (6 1/2 if you count babies) including 2 vegetarians.

text: I got a cheese pizza with red sauce and one with a pesto swirl and the garlic and olive oil sauce. Both were simple, but delicious.

name: Scott Russo
text: Been to several locations, food is always good, atmosphere here is great but the servers make it one of the best, always fast friendly and helpful.

name: JC3
text: Tasty pizza.  Good atmosphere, nice place to bring the whole family.  A lot of tv's, most playing sports.  Some individual tables have their own small tv.  Nice drink selection.

name: Jason Anderson
text: Great pizza. Probably the best pizza I have ever had... Very good.

name: Chelsey Antonio
text: Always great food,drinks,and atmosphere. Only negative thing is they are normally very busy so expect wait, the food does take a while to get, and sometimes they're so busy they forget your appetizers :(

text: I had an allergic reaction to something.  Sorry

text: We ordered takeout over the phone. They were a little slow and screwed up the order but we very accommodating to fix it and friendly. Over all can't complain.

name: Ashley Zito
text: It was very good and the people were helpful with telling me what was good. My family and I were first timers.

name: Sheila Keller
text: Such a fun place.  If you are looking for something to do on Tuesday nights, check out their live trivia game.  It starts at about 10pm and is a hosted event.  Bring your own team but leave your cell phones behind :)
